description: India has suffered as much as any other agricultural country from the devastation of soil erosion. This film gives a vivid account of the effects of soil erosion on village life, and shows clearly the dangers of uncontrolled erosion. The Forestry Department of the Indian government is applying various methods to combat erosion.
